name: Guild Wars<sup>®</sup> Game of the Year Edition
detailed_description:
An award-winning online fantasy epic awaits. No Subscription Fees!

Take your first step into Guild Wars®, the award-winning fantasy online roleplaying game enjoyed by millions of players. Across Tyria, the human kingdoms are under attack by the vicious Charr. As a young hero caught between the powerful will of King Adelbern and the rebellious Prince Rurik, you are called upon to defend humanity. Will you become an instrument of the ancient prophecy or be crushed beneath it? Rally your strength and the power of your guild to establish your legend.


  • Play solo or in a Party: Go it alone, join with other players, or recruit a party of henchmen that you control.
  • No subscription fees: Buy the game and play online with no monthly fees.*
  • Custom adventures: When you leave the bustling cities, experience adventures created just for you and your party.
  • Play with them or against them: Build a guild with other players and enter Player vs. Player tournaments for in-game prizes.
  • Bonus Items!
    Every adventurer needs a little help when they're starting out. Wield these seven customized bonus weapons, wands, and items to tip the edge of battle in your favor, or summon a Fire Imp to blast your foes!
  • * Requires product purchase and access to Internet. Player is responsible for all applicable Internet fees.

short_description: An award-winning online fantasy epic awaits. No Subscription Fees! Take your first step into Guild Wars®, the award-winning fantasy online roleplaying game enjoyed by millions of players. Across Tyria, the human kingdoms are under attack by the vicious Charr.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian, Polish, Korean*, Japanese

* languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum

  • Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® III 800 Mhz or equivalent
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.6 GB Available HDD Space
  • Video Card: ATI® Radeon® 8500 or NVIDIA® GeForce® 3 or 4 MX Series Video Card with 32MB of VRAM
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
  • Internet Connection: required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended

  • Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® III 1 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.6 GB Available HDD Space
  • Video Card: ATI® Radeon® 9000 or NVIDIA® GeForce® 4 Ti Series Video Card with 64MB of VRAM
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
  • Internet Connection: Broadband Internet Connection
